content: Would anyone here be opposed to me creating a new free Pythia Slack workspace (without the users and organization of the old one) that we can test drive as part of our iteration planning meeting in two weeks? We'd have I think 90 days to figure out if we want/need to use the paid version and evaluate its feasibility, and it might be easier to estimate those costs once we have some users in place
Sounds reasonable to me. I need to get in a better Slack habit.

It's available to join here! I can send an email later as well. I haven't dropped in any useful channels yet. I envision creating channels for particular iterations and projects as needed, but otherwise we can chat about our needs there at that meeting!
